name: BEEP
summary: A combination of Yoshi’s Island-style platforming with a gravity gun right out of Half-Life, BEEP is an amazing physics-platformer. Despite its friendly art style, this is a hardcore platformer in the truest sense.
info:
• 中文名: 嘟嘟哔哔漫游银河
  • 平台: pc
  • 游戏类型: 独立游戏
  • 发行日期: 2011年5月7日
